answers.answer: Hi,Causes of  arm,hand and body numbness are –Pressure on spinal nerves such as from a herniated disk, Pressure on peripheral nerves, Diabetes, Stroke, TIA, Underactive thyroid, Raynaud’s phenomenon and toxic nerve damage . Please consult a physician for complete examination and diagnosis . Hope this helps you . Take care and regards !

question: I have been experiencing left body, arm and hand, numbness which has been progressive, starting about 2 weeks ago.I had successful left hand Carpal Tunnel Syndrome surgery in Feb., 2009.  Also in November, 2008 on my right hand. Both surgeries resulted in release of numbness, tingling and pain following surgery.Please explain possible cause.jerry333
title: Source of left body, arm and hand, numbness
